description.value: The Gunslinger is a master of firearms and quick reflexes, wielding pistols with deadly precision.

levels.name: Gunslinger’s Focus
levels.description: You gain Focus Points equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1). You can spend Focus Points to gain advantage on firearm attacks or add up to 3 points to your initiative roll. Focus Points replenish on short or long rests.

levels.name: Gunplay
levels.description: You can attack twice whenever you take the Attack action with a firearm.

levels.name: Gunslinger Creed
levels.description: Choose a creed that defines your Gunslinger: The Protector, The Avenger, or The Wanderer.

levels.name: Fan the Hammer
levels.description: Spend 2 Focus Points to make an attack against every creature in a 15-foot cone. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Dexterity modifier) or take 1d6 piercing damage per Gunslinger level.

levels.name: Gunslinger’s Reflexes
levels.description: Add your proficiency bonus to your AC against one ranged attack per round.

levels.name: Ka-Tet Bond
levels.description: As a bonus action, give an ally within 30 feet advantage on their next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

levels.name: Endless Focus
levels.description: Once per day, when you roll initiative, you regain all your Focus Points.

levels.name: Ricochet Shot
levels.description: You can make an attack roll against a creature behind cover, ignoring the cover penalty.

levels.name: The Gunslinger’s Code
levels.description: As a bonus action, mark a target within 60 feet. For 1 minute, you have advantage on attack rolls against the target, and the target has disadvantage on saving throws against your abilities.

levels.name: The White Tower
levels.description: Once per long rest, for 1 minute: Focus Point abilities cost 0 points, your movement speed doubles, and firearm attacks critically hit on a roll of 18-20.

levels.name: Shield Ally
levels.description: When an ally within 5 feet is attacked, use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

levels.name: Inspiring Presence
levels.description: Allies within 30 feet can add your Wisdom modifier to their saving throws.

levels.name: Unyielding Guardian
levels.description: When an ally is reduced to 0 HP within 30 feet, use your reaction to restore them to 1 HP.
